name: chips.omp.json
description: Non-Standard Compliant Material Design-Inspired Chips Theme for Oh-My-Posh Theme.

scripts.snapshot-local-ref: pwsh -Command Write-Host "oh-my-posh config export image --author 'CodexLink, More Samples at https://github.com/CodexLink/chips.omp.json' --config ~/chips.omp.json --cursor-padding 20 --rprompt-offset 20 --output highlight.png"
scripts.snapshot-remote: oh-my-posh config export image --author 'CodexLink, More Samples at https://github.com/CodexLink/chips.omp.json' --config chips.omp.json --cursor-padding 20 --rprompt-offset 20 --output assets\highlight_temp.png

author: Janrey "CodexLink" Licas
